overview: Sexy Latina Veronica Rodriguez enjoys the breeze of the great outdoors as she seduces Van Wylde with a slow dance. • A simple kiss evolves into a sexy striptease as Alexis Venton uses her ample charms to coax her man Michael Vegas out of his clothes. • Smoking hot Vanessa Sixxx stares at the beautiful view of her glass balcony and spies her man, Marco Rivera, on the balcony beneath her. • Sage Evans and her man Ryan Driller are so happy to see one another that they can't help but steal al laughing kiss on the stair landing.
title: Summer Heat
